reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Refugee Consortium of Kenya - Enhanced support for SGBV survivors in Dadaab Garissa and Kakuma

description.narrative: While many refugees face various protection challenges sexual and gender based violence is common and widespread among mainly refugees and asylum seekers living in Dadaab Kakuma and Garissa. Some of the causative factors include overpopulation in the refug ee camps lack/inadequate livelihood activities harful cultural norms beliefs and practices such as Female Genital Mutilation (FGM) and illiteracy.The objectives of the project;- to enhance access to justice an legal assistance for survivors of SGBV in Kaku ma and Dadaab refugee camps and Garissa- to improve access of psychosocial and medical support to survivors of SGBV within Dadaab refugee camp and Garissa- to strengthen the capacity of key stakeholders to prevent and respond to GBV in Dadaab and Kakuma
